dataList.content: On that spring day, I made a small mirror. I named it 'Yeonsim'.
And, I happened to catch a signal while tuning out numerous noises and shatterings.
In Yeonsim, I met you at last.
My left-handed self... beautiful and serene.
It's a pleasure to meet you. I am...

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content: Yi Sang, isn't it. What a peculiar experience this is.

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content: And that mirror you're holding...
It's what I call Yeonsim.

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content:
Yeonsim, huh...
(硏, to grind or study; 尋, to seek)
This is a product of grinding something... scraping even the mind to polish it.

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content: I see. I suppose all versions of Yi Sang were dedicated to research.
You have wings on your back, if my eyes aren't being deceitful.

dataList.title: Yeonsim
dataList.content: ...What do you think of them?
...Resplendent.
They look quite warm... and free.
We looked into and ahead of each other.
I only made minor modifications to Brother Young-ji's work.
I wanted to show a reflection of any possibility in its unvarnished image, without a blur.
The stars I saw while lying on the ground here seemed so far away...
Yet it was possible to see them up close.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Is this why I haven't been able to see you lately? To discover this? I thought you caved to your yearning for rice and went back to S Corp's district...

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: I'll say, though... This isn't half bad.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Dongrang, why are you laughing like that?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It's just funny that you're talking so ferociously when your eyes are full of curious twinkles.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Yi Sang, will you tell him to shut it?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Why don't you first hide your facial recreation of a child who's tried ice cream for the first time?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Gubo, why don't you say something? You've been part of the League for fairly long now, so stop standing around like a guest.
...What more do I have to add? Everyone already seems to be of one mind.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: ...If you're trying to be an odd one out, at least have some audacity. Some cold fish you are.
I see... So this... is how you view the world.
...The world I view, is it.
Did you know? They say every invention carries hints of the hopes and dreams of its inventor.
Discovering them is one of the spectators' joys. It's a tidbit that's good to know.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: So, Yi Sang, what do you plan to do with this technology?
Do... what exactly?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Brother Young-ji's glass window is already making the rounds. Researchers from other Nests have taken an interest, or so I've heard.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Really... We rarely saw visitors in the past, but now we might have to start punching tickets so all those people will stand in line.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: So if you announce your work here...
Dongrang, I have absolutely no intention of announcing this.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...None? At all?
All that I ask...
Is to keep this as a moment of laughter, solely between us.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Look, just what is your idea of...

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Pft... Yi Sang. That was the second funniest moment I've seen out of you.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: The first is... y'know, when the yellow calf was being fed milk, and it suddenly licked his hair... Pfh...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: True, I've never seen Dongbaek laugh as loudly as then.
T-That... I think we'd best forget...
Human eyes are such glistening and scalding things. Fearing that they would burn me, I tended to watch them from the side.
However, not seeing the subject straightly does not mean I think lowly of them.
Even without looking, it is possible to seep in.
By the way, is that... the same as the mirror we use?
Similar, to be exact. Limbus Company uses a mirror with special modifications.
You invented something incredible, Yi Sang...
What Young-ji and I did... wasn't invention; we discovered, rather.
T Corp... wouldn't have been pleased with the idea of a technology capable of peeping into other worlds without permission.
I do believe you know well enough that their problem lies with the lack of permission, not the capability of the technology.
Although we had figured that...
We thought it would be fine since it was only used as a pastime between us.
The decision couldn't have been more glib.
